front.title: An Analysis of ASPA-based AS_PATH Verification

abstract.t: Autonomous System Provider Authorization (ASPA) is very helpful in detecting and mitigating route leaks (valley-free violations) and a majority of forged-origin hijacks. This document does an analysis on ASPA-based AS_PATH verification to help people understand its strengths and deficiencies. The document can help people deploy ASPA properly and provide some potential directions of enhancing ASPA.
